name: Hat Story
description:
So, i got 'A game where you collect hats to unlock the next level.' 

I went good at the start, but then i got stuck in a bad loop what to do, etc. I really wish i had more time, i literally slept through the entire day. It was totally my fault. But this week i had 102F fever. So i spent all the week by sleeping. Next krassjam i will bring it!

It will tell you the controls and how you do it in-game.

Sorry for lack of levels.. as i said.. I was stuck in a bad loop of ideas.

And i'm not the best when it comes to level design.

-MixedFeelingsSoftwares.
